"Kehehehe, ah well. Looks like she got away. That's a shame really..."

Turning around, you saw that the laugh belonged to what could only be described as an old hag. Her pale wrinkled skin glowed almost green in the early morning light, her pure white hair tied into a bun didn't do much better to subtract from the weird coloring. Also she was extremely short, even though you were lying on your butt she just barely stood taller than you.

"Still, I thank you for trying at least, Mister...?"

"Eric," you added, reaching around for the object that the girl had dropped. "Here, she dropped this at least."

You were able to get a closer look at the item as you handed it to the old lady. It appeared to be some sort of golden idol, certainly very valuable looking that it came as no surprise to you someone would try and steal it. What was odd about it was that it depicted an obese naked woman, perhaps it was an icon of fertility.

"Thank you kindly, Eric. Honestly, I should probably lock these things up so no thieves make off with them. A little old lady like me is no match for you youngsters these days..."

The statue hit the counter with a thunk. You stared down at it as Desdemona smiled up at you.

“But…you just…got that back…why–?”

“Yes, Eric, I got this little beauty back, but I have been waiting for the right person to come along for it. I am sure that you are that person.” She shoved the statue a little closer to you.

You realized with a jolt that your fingers were twitching less than a hairsbreadth away from the polished golden curves. Snapping your hand back, you looked up at the strange little woman.

“Got some ‘magic’ telling you that, huh?” She nodded without a trace of sarcasm on her face. “How much?” you asked before you could stop yourself.

“No charge, Eric. That you tried to stop that thief is more than enough payment for me.”

You frowned with more than a little skepticism. Even if the statue wasn’t solid gold, it had to be rather expensive. Even your inexperienced eye could tell that. And she was going to give it away to you for free? You almost couldn’t hold in the laugh at that.

“Really? There isn’t going to be a curse or anything like that? Isn’t that how it usually works with these magical gifts?”

She gasped and put her hands over her heart. “You wound me, Eric. I am merely trying to reward you for your good deed, and you think I would try to curse you for something like that?”

You grumbled a bit. A part of you though that she might be sincere, but another part noted that she didn’t deny it either. You hemmed and hawed for a bit, your gaze drifting over the absurd and gorgeous curves of the statue. Why were you so concerned about a magic curse, it was not like any of that really existed after all. And the statue was rather attractive to you. You though you even knew the perfect spot to display it.

“Fine, I’ll take it.”

Desdemona laughed and clapped her hands. “I knew I had a good feeling when I saw you try to stop that horrid woman! Enjoy the statue and all the luck it will bring you!” She then shoved the statue into your hands.

As you grasped the golden curves, there was an odd tingle in your fingers that soon spread throughout your body. It left so quick that you were sure that you imagined it.

You soon returned to your car and sped off, never looking back at Spells R Us. You only had eyes for the oddest gift you had ever received. Once at home, you spent a bit of time surfing the web, checking out some of your favorite pics and stories and finding a few new ones that trip your trigger. All the while, the statue was resting beside your arm on your desk, the small golden eyes boring into you.

After you have satisfied yourself, you picked up the idol and took it through into the bedroom. As you thought, there was a perfect slot next on the bookcase for the statue. The usual cavalcade of fat women and skinny women ballooning with fat filled your dreams, but they seemed even more vivid and realistic than ever before. You awoke later feeling rested, and your mind filled with lingering traces of your dreaming fantasies. You frown a bit, something feels off, but you can’t quite put your finger on it. Shrugging it off, you throw the covers back.

It's going to be a big day tomorrow, for both you and the real Sue." Mary used her magic to get you up on your feet and then re-summoned the mirror. You gulped as Sue looks at you "Oh don't worry. She's always like that" she says and that's only the begging my good old Eric. She thinks with evilness.

"Come on. Let's keep on going for a bit more. Than we can order Alfredo' s pizza if you want"

Just thinking about food gives you the sprint as you try waddling again behind Sue.

1313321111111121211121111.content:
After the "run" you two have returned to Sue apartment.

"You know I've thought since my clothes won't suit me anymore and since you came here so quick to South-Africa, you can borrow mine for the time being?" Sue said as you're under the shower.

"Really???" you say exactly "I don't know how to thank you enough"

"Yes...just some more time and they will all fit like a glove" she whispers maliciously.

You finally changed up in some of Sue clothes: a pair of jeans, a v-neck gray shirt and a purple jacket. Sue also insisted that you let your hair free and put on her perfume. Isn't she just the nicest boss?

https://i0.wp.com/thepluslifeblog.com/wp...

You two hop in the Sue jeep: well Sue hopped, you use the jeep for raising you up, and when you sit you hear a pain noise as the car gets down a bit. Alfredo's pizzeria is not far from the base. As you two enter, you are greeted by a very overweighted middleaged man with black moustache.

Sue smiles warmly "Alfredo"

The man looks at Sue oddly:"Sue?? My beautiful girl. What happened to you?" he says rising his arms.

"Diet. Work required to" Sue apologizes. Alfredo smiles disappears, then he notices you behind her. "Let me introduce Erica, she my personal assistant Alfredo. And my good friend" Sue said pointing at you "She's already tasted your pizza and find it quite delicious. Right Erica?"

You smile and nod towards Alfredo. His smiles returned "Ah...I can see, you're sure a good taster Ms. Erica" he says then he reached for your hand "Let me have the honor to feed you once more" his arms reached for your back and gently guide you towards one of the booth, white Sue following close behind.

"Mike, two pizza of the house for these two beautiful ladies" he yells at the same guy you have seen some days ago.

"Just a salad for me" Sue cut short "I must stay in shape for the general visit...but I'll take a glass of soda nervetheless" Sue says "The regular for my friend here" she adds looking at you before sitting in the booth.

"Sure, sure" Alfredo says disappearing in the kitchen.

After a while Mike arrives with the salad and the pizza. The pizza of the house is a maxi-pizza with different ingredients which makes you salivary glands melt. "Soooo...pizza Erica if I've heard correctly"
You casually nod, already taking the first slice.
"Are you allergic to something...you look...swollen" he says after some seconds. Well he did met you when you were 200 pounds lighter and it was just mere days.

"May I speak to you for a second...Mike?" Sue jumps out the booth and reaches for Mike arm. That man could destroy her perfect plan.

"Yes Ma'am" he says as Sue guiding him far.

"Erica here...well you see, she's a good fork. And she's a bit understress. So she is eating a bit too much. It's not very kind to let her...notice it..." she whispers. He looks back as you're already on the third slice, eating like you missed two meals in a row.

"I can see it..." he whispers back

"She's lonley...just been ditched by a faggot....so please try to be nice with her, ok?"

"Well that's sad, she's seems a good girl" he adds.

Jackpot. That's the only thing Sue wanted to hear.

"Well...you know...maybe next time we order from her you can deliver us the pizza and I might need to leave the office..." she whispers

"Oh....ok" he says looking at you.

"You just need to let her........" Sue starts to whisper something to Mike's ear as you've already swallowed half of the pizza.

13133211111111212111211112.content:
Since you've entered Alfredo's, you've taken off your jacket and now you're only with your gray t-shirt. Your wide arms, now free from their cage, wobble around like jello at every movements under Sue's amused look. After you finish the pizza you pick the straw and drink the soda with an exciting look on your chubby face. Thanks to Sue spell whenever you introduce sugar into your body, you feel in a bliss. Food has become a drug to you.

You're suddenly reached by Alfredo:"Ahh...here's my favourite customer" he says smiling to Sue "...and my next one too I hope..yes?" he adds looking at you with a even bigger smile "Tell me Erica, you enjoyed my special Alfredo's pizza...yes?"

"Hmmm hmmmm" you nod still drinking the soda from the straw.

Alfredo blows a kiss to air with his hand "Ah..music to my ears" he looks Sue again "Maybe I can tempt you with a slice of Mama Cake..."

"Oh no..." Sue replies mocking "Not the Mama Cake" she giggles.

You suck the straw hard to finish it faster "Wha-what's the Mama Cake?" you wonder.

"Special Recipe of my dear mother" Alfredo say as he's acting some old tale with his hands "One of the sweatest cake in the world. Delcious like no other"

"S-sweatest cake?" you say, charmed by the man's words.

Sue raises an eyebrow "Don't listen to him. It isn't a recipe from his dear mother..." she looks at you then grins "...but it's delicious nevertheless"

Alfredo returns serious "So...two slices..yes?"

"No, no. Just one for my friend Erica, since she never tasted it and I want her to try. But I'll take a coffee. Believe it or not I need to work afterwards even if it's sunday"

Alfredo bend down near your face "She doesn't remember how good that cake is. But you'll soon know...you'll see" he says, extending his right arm and gently poking your cheek. Sue well remembers how the Mama Cake tastes and even how caloric it is.
Truth is, before giving you part of her fat, Sue would often come to Alfredo to gorge exactly as you're doing right now. That, plus the continuous snacks had inflated her like a blimp in those years and you are destined to the same fate at this point.

"Well Eric, this is just fair, right?" Sue thinks looking at you licking your lips.

After some minutes Alfredo came back with a plate with the pie "Here is the Mama Cake" he says presenting you the dish "homemade warm apple pie with Vanilla Bean Ice Cream and topped with Caramel. It's so good your tongue will melt"

https://i.redd.it/uyr5lo8j2duz.jpg

"It really looks delicious" you say exciting as a baby.

"Allow me" Alfredo says recovering the fork, he cuts down a piece and presents it to you. You giggle before obediently opening your lips. He gently place the pie inside your mouth and waits you to close it, then slowly, he take out the fork. You chew it for a bit and slowly swallow it. They were right. it's really good, the sweetness of the vanilla ice cream mixed with the caramel, soothes the apple sour taste.

"Hmmmmmm" you smile happily "It's really good Alfredo"

He laughes "Yes! I know you would love it" he says pleased "I will bring my favourite cherry milkshake to properly wash it down" he stops looking at Sue "It's on the house"

"Well, thank you!" You say happily under the amused look of Sue drinking her coffee. She knew that you would be hooked up. Beside, she also knew that Alfredo would be like this with your new...body: he wouldn't mind seeing a woman or a man gaining weight for his food especially when they enjoy it so much..."a healty customer is a happy customer" he would often says. And with glutton clients like you were now...well it would be even easier for him to pamper you.

You spend the rest of the time like this: a sip of milkshake a fork of pie, and after ten minutes you had eaten all the pie and drunk the milkshake.
You then raise, a bit full, and wear the jacket again. Full as you are now, you couldn't button it, so you left it open and follow Sue to the cash register.
Alfredo is waiting for you with a bag "Freshly baked donuts for Ms. Erica" he explains "Will you come here, more often now that we've meet..yes? I mean we're only the best pizzeria in town" he starts laughing again, poking his moustache. He suddenly hugs you (well due to Alfredo own weight it's more a belly hug) and for a brief moment you feel Alfredo's hands poking your back rolls, then he plants a loud kiss on your cheek "Grande, bella donna! Come here anytime you want" says some italian worlds you don't understand. You smile and recover the bag before leaving.

"I would say that's a good start for your new life as a blimp, Erica Newman" Sue whispers as you two reach for the jeep.

"What?" you ask, not understanding what Sue is saying.

Sue caughed "I said...Alfredo is always the best. You know, I think he has a soft spot for you, Erica Newman. Maybe he will offer us something for free in the future" she lies.

Two days later you wake up in your base apartment as the alarm goes off. You're wearing Sue pj, since it's the only thing you could anyway wear for the night. Even the pink tracksuit she gave you your first day has been somehow "shrunken", since you were always this big, right?

You begin your morning routine, washing yourself (thank god the shower is big enough to contain you), wearing the glasses, the necklace and the earrings Sue gave you, the strawberry perfume and finally Sue clothes: you pick a pair of black panties and bra which barely contain your melons-like boobs and wide ass.

Then you put on a gray t-shirt with longer sleeves to partially cover your bingo wings, and a pair of jeans that you had to close over your lower belly to fix it in its place. All ready you leave your apartment only to find Sue already waiting for you in her jeep. It seems she really wanted to keep you under eye. She is wearing a suit, grey jacket and grey skirt. She looks more good than ever with her long blond hair and skinny legs.

https://cdnb.lystit.com/photos/d8ec-2015...

"Good morning Erica" she says politly.

"Don't worry. I would pass from here anyway. Hmmm I know this perfume. Nice choice" she adds.

You smile "I've learnt from the best"

She approves with her head "You know the general will come at the end of the week, so I will need you stay focused. We will do the breakfast inside the office. I've already arranged that".

"Yes sir" you say, already dreaming of the breakfast. Even if Sue is now under 200 pounds, you still wonder why she always order so much food for just the two of us. However, you won't be the one to comply.


As the previous week, you work at your desk binging on donuts and waffles, while Sue comes in and out of the office to speak with the other people at the base.

"Well everything's good?" she finally says sitting at her desk and unbuttoning her jacket.

"Yes Sue" you say with your fingers still greasy clicking on the keyboard. You quickly lick them up in a very unappealing way.

Sue has to bite her lips to avoid laughing loudly "My very own fat gorger personal assistant"

Suddenly you hear a knock on the door.

"Come on in" Sue says.

A man in uniform came in. He's in his forty, bit muscolar and with short beard "Good morning Madam" he salutes

"Chief Warrant Anderson, you know I'm part of MWR just as my personal assistant here. You do not need to salute me" Sue explains to the man.

"I know Madam, but old habits die hard" he relaxes and grins a little before returning serious "So it's true. You did lose weight. Congratulations" he adds.

Sue closes her eyes and raises her eyebrows "Is this why you come to our office Chief Warrant, to see if the gossip were true?" she says bitter.

"Ha ha" he cracks "Touchè" he notices you "Oh. I didn't know you've hired a new assistant. I'm sorry for my manners Miss" he bows to you "I'm Chief Warrant Anderson, I'm pleased to meet" he adds offering his hand across your desk.

You reply with your hand still greasy from the snacks "Nice to meet you Sir...I-I'm Erica Newman" you reply polite.

Anderson feels the greasy in his hand after the shake and look at it in awkwardness. He turns to Sue "I imagine you're a long time friends...right Sue?"

"You can say so Frank...you can say so" Sue says smiling at you.

"Anyway Sue, I was sent to the building to ask if someone has any informations about CS-2 Eric Smith. It was sent to the base two weeks ago. Did you met him by any chance?"

Sue thinks a bit "Eric Smith.....? It doesn't ring any bells...maybe he was sent to the Naval Base in Simon's town"

"No. I've checked" he cuts short "What about you Ms. Newman?" he asks you.

Sue whispers something as both the necklace and the earrings shine faintly, but since the stone of the necklace is hide beneath your mammaries and the earrings are hidden by your long hair, the man doesn't notice. "Hmmmm Smith? I don't recall it. I'm sorry" you say touching your head.

"Everything's good Miss?" the man asks.

"Hmmmm? Yeah sorry. Just had a quick breakfast today and I must be low on sugar" you say.

Anderson looks at your desk where the box of donuts and waffles lay empty. "Ha...that must be the "quick brekfast" she speaks of" he thinks.

"I understand. Anyway please contact me if you have any news" he says after a while before leaving "Madams" he says saluting you both.

"Frank..." Sue says wavering. Then she raises, she picks something from her desk and reaches yours "Are you okay?" she asks.

"Yes Sue...sorry, I had a little dizziness" you say.

"Here, see if this helps" she says placing a box of twinkies on your desk. You don't make her repeat the phrase as you're already unwrapping the first sweet. "Keep up the good work" she adds with a malicious grin.

Sue looks with a bit of malicious as you greedily push the twinkie inside your open mouth. Seeing you gorge yourself never gets old for Sue.

Suddenly the phone rings. You swallow the last piece of the creamy twinkie down. Both your fingers and your lips are full of crumbs. Alongside with your recent weight gain, you've also started to act clumsier and bungling. Your bulky body doesn't help you as both your belly and breasts are always in the middle and hide your feet.

"H-hello M-Ms Sullivan Office speaking" you say recovering the phone on your desk.

"Y-yes. I'll put you through" you say gulping another piece down.

Sue however was faster than you and she's already up and near your desk. She pick the phone directly from your hand "Hello? Oh, Karen! How are you?..... Yes, yes of course..." Karen looks at you and a creepy grin widen on her face "Well I'm going out at the present moment but you'll find Erica here...ok. See you around. Bye bye" she says closing up. She turns to you again as you're finishing the last twinkie "Erica, Karen and Kate are passing by to pick up some documentations.. Listen.." she explains to you all the requested papers from her colleague. She then waves to you and walk out. You can only admire her well-fit body in comparison to yours. If only you could be like her.


You keep working for a bit, when you hear a knock on the door.

"Come on in" you say as Karen and Kate enter. Karen is in uniform while Kate is with a sweater and a skirt.

"Erica!" Karen says as she enters.

You smile "Mrs. Reed, I've already prepared the requested documents"

"Oh yes.." she picks the document from your hands and give it to Kate "Kate, would you give me and Erica a minute? Thank you" shey says pointing at the door. You're still wondering why she made that request that her assistant has already left the room.
Karen recovers a chair and places it near you as you look at her confused.

"So... Are you new here right?" she says.

You nod.

"How are the things with Sue?"

"O-oh oh.. She's simply the best around here. She's so good with me and the others people at the base"

"I see..." she pauses "tell me were you best friends?"

"What do you mean?" you ask confused.

"I mean..c'mon Erica, she gave you a little push to be here. Right?" she says elbowing you.

"Push?" you raise an eyebrow.

"Well let's be honest honey. I remember Sue being a little bigger, but you're clearly in no shape to work for the navy, even if you're just an assistant"

"I-I don't understand.. I"

Karen places a finger on your belly and pushes as it sinks into your fat "How much do you weigh? Four hundreds? Five hundreds pounds?" she grins.

"I... I" you stammer anxious.

"Don't worry honey" she says patting your belly "it was a rhetorical question" she gets up and opens the door "it was nice talking to you. Say hi to Sue for me will you?" she says leaving.

The truth here was that Sue deliberately asked Karen to making fun of you as a sort of "initiation" as you were the last one hired. However, Karen's words hit you harder than she thought.

You just hopped from the frying pan to the fire.

"Your sister?" Eric said, as his mind bounced up against the idea that this stranger had just described his stocky frame as "scrawny". Heck, he hadn't been scrawny even right after boot camp - what was this stranger on about. His sister? Eric tried desperately to think of any girl he'd gone out with who even remotely looked like this stranger.

"Yeah, my sister. You ought to remember her - you certainly spent a lot of your sailor's pay packet wining and dining her. But she's a bright woman - sure, she's big and likes being big, but she's got a brain too, little man - and she has a preference in men, and you are - guess what - not big enough for her."

Sister? Sister? Eric's brain fairly screamed trying to figure out which date this could be. He regularly spent a lot of his pay on dining out with girls with capacity... But he didn't think saying, what's her name, would win him any brownie points with this aggressive stranger.

"What, don't you remember her?" continued the stranger, accurately reading Eric's confusion. "Let me help you. About four inches shorter than you are, and I'd guess about 60 pounds heavier than you are - maybe more, if you're not packing as much muscle as I think. Long brown hair, lotsa blond highlights, snub little nose, penchant for pink tops and cats, likes to sing and cook...remembering her now? She's an accountant by trade, but I suspect you never asked about her job - she only found out yours by accident! You gotta look up past her breasts and remember that women got brains too!"

The stranger paused as a look of comprehensive swept over Eric's face. "Elisa!" Eric blurted out, his mind filling with memories of a generous, voluptuous girl with a big laugh and a big appetite, who had kept him talking all night, much to his surprise.

"Yeah, that's my sister. She sent me with a message - well two messages, really. One is that she really, really likes you, and she'd like to go out with you, get to know you. She knows what you'd like her to do, and she's good with getting bigger - maybe even a lot bigger.

"Message number two is that if she's going to be serious with you, you gotta be serious with her. She has tastes in men too, and you don't quite measure up.
You like big women? She likes big men! So, you gotta grow. She knows you can't get much bigger and stay in the Navy, so she's working out a deal - you're a good baker, right? That's why you've put on enough pudge to upset the Navy. So, she's offering you a job. Your commitment to the Navy is almost up. Our old man runs a bakery, and she's convinced him to give you a slot in the test kitchens. He'd do anything for her, so you're a shoe-in - so long's you don't screw up, either in the baking or with her. But here's where all that's aiming - she wants you to get big too, she wants you to double your weight for her. In return, she'll probably gain as much too. Don't know what Grandad'll think of a 420 pound Elisa, but probably the same thing as he'll think of a new 360 pound son-in-law...

"So, that's the message. Basically, come work for us and double your weight, and you and Elisa can live in happiness together. Or, you can carry on as you are, fat sailor boy. What do I tell her?"

Eric's brain reeled. Leave the navy - well, that's not too hard, no more worrying about physicals, but DOUBLE his weight? He'd be a blimp! On the other hand, so would she - and she was gorgeous now, think how fabulous she'd look 100 or even, well 180 pounds heavier....what would he say to Elisa's brother, and so to her.
